text: St. Johnsbury (known locally as "St. J") is the shire townTitle 24, Part I, Chapter 1, ยง4, Vermont Statutes. Accessed 2007-11-01. (county seat) of Caledonia County, Vermont, United States. The population was 7,364 at the 2020 census. St. Johnsbury is located about northwest of the Connecticut River and south of the Canada-U.S. border. ==References== Category:Towns in Vermont Category:County seats in Vermont
title: St. Johnsbury, Vermont
